Data.kFindSaidInfoLoki: The SAID is a unique identification number for your appliance. Please see image to locate the position of your SAID.
Data.kFindConnectButtonDescriptionLoki: Find the Wi-Fi Symbol located on your appliance surface as shown in the image and press it.
Data.KClearNetworkInstructionsLoki: On your appliance, please follow these instructions:{step} Press and hold Wi-Fi Symbol for 3 seconds to clear the network settings.{step}Wait until Wi-Fi indicator goes off.{step} After that, press on NEXT.
Data.kFindSaidInfoOberonFreezer: The SAID is a unique identification number for your appliance. Please see image to locate the position of your SAID.
Data.kFindConnectButtonDescriptionOberonFreez: Find the 'Connect' button on the user interface inside the product as shown in the image and press it
Data.KClearNetworkInstructionsOberonFreezer:
On your appliance, please follow these instructions:{step}If Wi-Fi indicator is blinking, then press and hold CONNECT button on the panel for 15 seconds. {step}Wait until Wi-Fi indicator goes off.{step} After that, press on NEXT.
 If Wi-Fi indicator is off, then press NEXT.
Data.kFindSaidInfoOberonRefrigerator: The SAID is a unique identification number for your appliance. Please see image to locate the position of your SAID.
Data.kFindConnectButtonDescriptionOberonRefri: Find the 'Connect' button on the user interface inside the product as shown in the image and press it
Data.KClearNetworkInstructionsOberonRefrigera:
On your appliance, please follow these instructions:{step}If Wi-Fi indicator is blinking, then press and hold CONNECT button on the panel for 15 seconds. {step}Wait until Wi-Fi indicator goes off.{step} After that, press on NEXT.
 If Wi-Fi indicator is off, then press NEXT.
Data.kFindSaidInfoMinervaOven: {step} As this product doesn't have the QR code, kindly use the Manual Method to enter the SAID and MAC ID.{step} To locate SAID and MAC ID, follow the path on the Appliance Display: Tools > Wireless Features > SAID Code.
Data.kFindConnectButtonDescriptionMinervaOven: {step} Tap the "Tools" button on the display {step} Scroll down to "Wireless Features" {step} Find "Connect Network" on the screen and then tap "Edit" {step} Tap the "Search Network" button {step} Select your home network name {step} Enter the password
Data.KClearNetworkInstructionsMinervaOven: To clear the network settings, follow these instructions on your appliance LCD screen. {step}Tap the "Tools" button on the display {step} Scroll down to "Wireless Features" {step} Select "Disble Wi-Fi"
Data.kFindSaidInfoU2Oven: The SAID is a unique identification number for your appliance. Please see image to locate the position of your SAID.
Data.kFindConnectButtonDescriptionU2: On your appliance, please follow these instructions: Set all knobs to the "Wi-Fi" setting. Once the knobs are in position, press the "Start" button on your appliance.
Data.KClearNetworkInstructionsU2Oven: On your appliance, please follow these instructions: {step} Set all knobs to the "Wi-Fi" setting. {step} Once the knobs are in position, hold the "Start" button on your appliance for 15 seconds.
Data.kFindSaidInfoJADish: The SAID Label is a unique identification number for your appliance. It is located on the inside panel of the dishwasher door.
Data.kFindConnectButtonDescriptionJADish: On your appliance, please follow these instructions: Press Connect Button. The Wi-Fi icon will start blinking
Data.KClearNetworkInstructionsJADish: On your appliance, please follow these instructions: {step} Press and hold the Connect button for 15 seconds to clear the network settings
Data.kFindSaidInfoBellaRefrigerator: The SAID is a unique identification number for your appliance. Please see image to locate the position of your SAID.
Data.kFindConnectButtonDescriptionBella: Find the 'Connect' button on the user interface inside the product as shown in the image and press it
Data.KClearNetworkInstructionsBella:
On your appliance, please follow these instructions:{step}If Wi-Fi indicator is blinking, then press and hold CONNECT button on the panel for 30 seconds. {step}Wait until Wi-Fi indicator goes off.{step} After that, press on NEXT.
 If Wi-Fi indicator is off, then press NEXT.

Data.settings.smart_home.nest_details: Set NEST to react to changes
Data.settings.nest.nest_instruction: Please ensure your JennAir smart appliance is connected to the JennAir APP and Wi-Fi.{step}Click on Add NEST and log in to the NEST App{step}Select NEST location & start using NEST features with your compatible JennAir smart appliances
Data.settings.nest2.nest_details: Set Nest Learning ThermostatsÂ® to react to the oven's rising temperature and decrease room temperature by a set number of degrees. Receive alerts when the oven is left on and no one is home, all through the app.* * Away signal can take up to two hours.
Data.settings.amazon_alexa.compatible_applian: Works only with selected compatible appliances. Follow the steps below to go the Amazon Alexa app to find out if your appliance is compatible.
Data.settings.amazon_alexa.amazon_alexa_instr: Please ensure your JennAir connected appliance is connected to the JennAir APP and Wi-Fi.{step}Open the Alexa APP and log in.{step}Click the ENABLE button, or say, "Alexa, enable JennAir skill".{step}Enter your JennAir account username and password to link your account to Alexa.
Data.settings.amazon_alexa2.amazon_alexa_deta: Manage functions like setting and adjusting cooking times and temperatures or turning the oven off with simple voice commands using a compatible voice enabled device.
Data.settings.google_home.compatible_applianc: Works only with selected compatible appliances. Follow the steps below to go the Google Home app to find out if your appliance is compatible.
Data.settings.google_home.instructions: Please ensure your JennAir connected appliance is connected to the JennAir APP and Wi-Fi.{step}Turn to your Google Home and say,"OK Google, ask JennAir to link my account".{step}Google Assistant will display a LINK card in the Google Home APP. Launch the Google Home APP, and tap the Discover tab to click LINK.{step}If you don't see a LINK card, you may need to close the Google Home APP and relaunch it.{step}Enter your JennAir account username and password to link your account to Google Home.
Data.settings.google_home2.google_home_detail: Manage functions on compatible ovens like setting and adjusting cooking times and temperatures or turning the oven off with simple voice commands using a compatible voice enabled device.

Data.s2c.appliance_offline.appliance_offline_: %s is currently offline. This could be caused by changing routers, router names, passwords or if your router connection to the internet is down.
